name: Down in earth
description:
This game is part of the 2019 Epic MegaJam.

Down to earth is a solo puzzle game.
Your goal is to dig the earth to find the earth jewel.

Keyboard Controls:

W/S : Up/Down
A/D: Left/Right
Left mouse button : dig earth
Right mouse button : dig ice (if equiped)
Space bar : Force field

Gamepad Controls (Xbox controller): 

Left joystick : movement (Up/Down/Left/Right)
Right Trigger : dig earth
A : Force field

Team: White Smoke Games

- Xavier David: Game Designer
- Thomas Goubier: Game Artist
- Alexis Coeurderoy: Game Programmer
- Ilyes Ouhabi: Game Programmer
- Yanis Hamel: Game Programmer
